name: web-accessibility
description: Audit Web Accessibility issues in Visual Studio Code

webAccessibility.maxNumberOfProblems.description: Controls the maximum number of problems produced by the server.

webAccessibility.semanticExclude.description: Controls if non-semantic HTML is going to produce problems by the server.

webAccessibility.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd client && npm run update-vscode && cd .. && npm run compile
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
